document_data.mainbody:
Windstone was one of the Palace families who served the Crown of Cormyr in the 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Windstones were career officiers for multiple generations. Like other officers and chamberlains, the Windstone family resided at Cormyrs Royal Court south of Castle Obarskyr. Lady Jalessa Windstone took office of the Lady of Graces in the .
